tuv.seg: Claiming a social welfare payment
Ag éileamh iocaíochta leasa shóisialaigh
The Department of Social Protection has a range of social welfare payments that provide financial support
Tá réimse íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh ag an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí a sholáthraíonn tacaíocht airgeadais
To get a social welfare payment, you must apply
Chun íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a fháil, ní mór duit cur isteach uirthi
So, if you think you are entitled to a payment you should apply unless you are certain you don't qualify
Go hiondúil, níl aon duine chun teacht chugat le tairiscint íocaíochta leasa shóisialaigh
Your first step before applying, is to find out which payment you may be entitled to
An chéad chéim ná a fháil amach cén íocaíochtaí a d'fhéadfá a bheith i dteideal a fháil

Payments are available for unemployed people, for families and children, for widows, widowers and surviving civil partners, for guardians or orphans, for older and retired people and for disabled people and their carers

Tá íocaíochtaí ar fáil don lucht dífhostaithe,do theaghlaigh agus pháistí, do bhaintreacha, bhaintreacha fir agus páirtnéirí sibhialta marthanacha, do chaomhnóirí nó dhílleachta, do sheanóirí agus dhaoine scortha agus do dhaoine míchumasaithe agus a gcúramóirí
If you get a social welfare payment you may also qualify for extra social welfare benefits
Má fhaigheann tú íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh, féadfaidh tú bheith i dteideal sochair bhreise a fháil
To apply for a social welfare payment you must fill in an application form and provide other supporting documentation
Chun cur isteach ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh, ní mór duit an fhoirm iarratas a chomhlánú agus cáipéisíocht thacaíochta a sholáthar
The information and documentation varies from one payment to another
Bíonn éagsúlacht sa bhfaisnéis agus sa cháipéisíocht a theastaíonn ó íocaíocht go híocaíocht
The type of documentation required will also depend on your personal circumstances
Braithfidh sé ar do chúinsí chomh maith
However, you must normally submit some documentation with your claim form
Ach go hiondúil, ní mór duit roinnt cáipéisíochta a chur faoi bhráid le d'fhoirm éilimh
If you apply for, or are currently getting a social welfare payment (including Child Benefit) you may be asked to register for a Public Services Card

Má dhéanann tú iarratas ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh, nó má tá tú á fáil i láthair na huaire (lena n-áirítear Sochair Linbh), féadfaidh tú cuireadh a fháil chun clárú i gcomhair do Chárta Seirbhísí Poiblí
If you qualify for a payment, you may be able to get an increase in your payment for an adult dependant
Má cháilíonn tú le haghaidh íocaíocht, féadfaidh tú méadú a fháil i d'íocaíocht i gcomhair duine fásta cleithiúnach
You may be able to claim for a child dependant
Féadfaidh tú éileamh i gcomhair linbh chleithiúnach
If it is possible to claim for dependants, the Department of Social Protection will request information about your dependants on the application form
Más féidir éileamh i gcomhair cleithiúnach beidh an Roinn ag iarraidh faisnéise faoi do chleithiúnaigh ar an bhfoirm iarratas
It may take some time for the Department to process your claim
D'fhéadfadh an Roinn tamall a chaitheamh ar an éileamh a phróiseáil
As part of the procedure, you may be interviewed in your home or asked to attend an interview at your local social welfare office
Mar chuid den phróiseas, féadfar tú a chur faoi agallamh i do bhaile nó féadfar iarraidh ort freastal ar agallamh ag d'oifig leasa shóisialaigh áitiúil
While your claim is being processed by the Department, you may qualify for Supplementary Welfare Allowance
Féadfaidh tú a bheith incháilithe le haghaidh Liúntas Forlíontach Leasa Shóisialaigh fad is atá d'éileamh á phróiseáil ag an Roinn
It is important that you make your claim as soon as you know you are entitled to the payment
Tá sé tábhachtach go ndéanann tú d'éileamh chomh luath agus a thuigeann tú go bhfuil tú i dteideal na híocaíochta
All payments must be claimed within a specific period of time
Ní mór íocaíochtaí go léir a éileamh taobh istigh de thréimhse ama shonrach
If you don't claim on time you may lose out
Mura n-éilíonn tú in am féadfaidh tú cailliúint ar íocaíocht
Find out more about making a late claim
Faigh amach tuilleadh faoi éileamh déanach a dhéanamh

If you are asked to provide information reasonably required by a social welfare inspector when investigating your claim you must provide the statements, information or documents within 21 days. The same time period applies to your spouse, civil partner, cohabitant, employer and certain other people (for example, landlords)

I gcomhair Pinsean Stáitse (Ranníocach), Pinsean Stáitse (Neamh-Ranníocach), Pinsean Stáitse (Idirthréimhseach) agus Pinsean na nEaslán, is féidir cur isteach orthu trí mhí sula mbeidh tú i dteideal do phinsean a fháil
If you are refused a social welfare payment or get a lesser amount than you expected, you have 21 days to appeal the decision of the Department of Social Protection
Má dhiúltaítear íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh duit nó má fhaigheann tú suim níos lú ná mar a bhí tú ag súil léi, tá 21 lá agat chun achomharc a dhéanamh leis an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
There is additional information about how the Department makes decisions on claims in 'Further information' below
Tá eolas breise maidir le conas a dhéanann an Roinn cinntí ar éilimh in 'Tuilleadh Eolais' thíos
You must complete the application form and provide supporting documentation
Ní mór duit an fhoirm iarratas a chomhlánú agus an cháipéisíocht thacaíochta a sholáthar
You can get an application or claim form, from the Department of Social Protection, your Intreo Centre or Social Welfare Branch Office or your local Citizens Information Centre
Is féidir foirm iarratas nó foirm éilimh a fháil ón Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí, ó d'Ionad Intreo ó d'oifig leasa shóisialaigh áitiúil nó ó d'Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh áitiúil
You can also get an application form from the Department's website
Is féidir foirm iarratas a íoslódáil agus a comhlánú chomh maith ó láithreán gréasáin na Roinne
You can also apply for some services online
Is féidir iarratas ar líne ar sheirbhísí áirithe a dhéanamh
Your Intreo Centre, Social Welfare Branch Office or your local Citizens Information Centre can help you fill in your claim form
Cabhróidh d'Ionad Intreo, d'oifig leasa shóisialaigh áitiúil nó d'Ionad Faisnéise do Shaoránaigh áitiúil leat d'fhoirm iarratas a chomhlánú

If you need a birth, marriage or death certificate for any social welfare payment you can buy it at a reduced rate (currently €1) from your nearest Superintendent Registrars Office or the General Registrar Office (GRO)

Má tá Teastas Breithe, Pósta nó Báis uait i gcomhair íocaíocht Árachais nó Cúnaimh Leasa Shóisialaigh, is féidir é a cheannach ar tháille laghdaithe (1 euro faoi láthair) ó Oifig an Phríomh-Chláraitheora is gaire duit nó ó Oifig an Ard-Chláraitheora
To get the reduced rate you need a letter or note from the Department to prove that the certificate is needed for those purposes
Oifig Náisiúnta is ea Oifig an Ard-Chláraitheora
The Department of Social Protection will keep any certificates you get for a reduced fee
Is Oifigí Áitiúla iad Oifigí an Phríomh-Chláraitheora (oifig do gach Contae de ghnáth)
The Superintendent Registrars are located in each county and hold records of all births, deaths and marriages that took place in those counties
De ghnáth, beidh litir ón Leasa Shóisialaigh de dhíth, mar chruthúnas go bhfuil an teastas ag teastáil ar mhaithe le gnóthaí Leasa Shóisialaigh
You can get more information about getting a Birth, Marriage or Death certificate
Coimeádfaidh an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí na teastais ar tháille laghdaithe
To claim a social welfare payment you should fill in the correct application form and return it to the Department of Social Protection
Chun íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a éileamh ba chóir duit an fhoirm iarratas cheart a chomhlánú agus í a sheoladh ar ais chuig an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí
The return address is printed on the application form
Tá an seoladh fillte priontáilte ar chúl na foirme iarratas

To apply for Rent Supplement or other payments under the Supplementary Welfare Scheme you must apply to the Department of Social Protection's representative (formerly known as the Community Welfare Officer) at your local health centre
Lena chur isteach ar Fhordheontas Cíosa nó íocaíochtaí eile faoi Scéim Liúntas Forlíontach Leasa Shóisialaigh, ní mór duit dul i dteagmháil le d'oifig sláinte áitiúil
How social welfare decisions are made
Conas a dhéantar cinntí leasa shóisialaigh
Deciding Officers are employed by the Department of Social Protection to accept or reject claims made in Ireland for social welfare payments
Tá Oifigigh Cinnidh fostaithe ag an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí chun glacadh nó diúltú le héilimh a dhéantar in Éirinn le haghaidh íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh
Deciding officers are given the power to make these decisions through the Social Welfare Consolidation Act 2005 as amended and other social welfare legislation
Tugtar an chumhacht na cinntí seo a dhéanamh d’Oifigigh Breithiúnachta tríd an Acht Leasa Shóisialaigh (Comhdhlúthú) 2005 agus reachtaíocht leasa shóisialaigh roimhe seo
Before making a claim or applying for a social welfare payment you must complete the application form
Roimh duit iarratas a dhéanamh nó a éileamh ar íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh, ní mór duit an fhoirm iarratais a chomhlánú
The application form will ask for various details, such as your name, address, PPS number, income etc
Iarrfaidh an fhoirm iarratais ar shonraí éagsúla, mar shampla d'ainm, do sheoladh, d’uimhir PSP, d’ioncam srl
These details will help the Department of Social Protection to process your application and if your claim is successful to put it into payment
Tabharfaidh na sonraí seo cabhair don Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí d'iarratas a phróiseáil agus, má éiríonn le d’éileamh, é a íoc
As part of the application process, you must also provide supporting documentation to prove that the information you have given on the application form is correct
Mar chuid den phróiseas iarratais, ní mór duit doiciméadú tacaíochta a chur ar fáil freisin chun a chruthú go bhfuil an t-eolas atá tugtha agat ar an bhfoirm iarratais ceart
For example, a birth certificate to prove you have given the correct date of birth
Mar shampla, iarrfar ort ar theastas breithe chun a chruthú gur thug tú an dáta breithe cruinn
To qualify for a social welfare payment you must meet all the qualifying criteria for that payment
Ionas go mbeifeá incháilithe íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh a fháil, ní mór duit na critéir sháinithe uile a shásamh i gcomhair na híocaíochta sin
Different social welfare payments have different qualifying criteria
Tá critéir cháilitheacha éagsúla ag íocaíochtaí leasa shóisialaigh éagsúla
It is your responsibility to prove to the Department that you qualify for the payment you have applied for
Tá an fhreagracht ort a chruthú don Roinn go bhfuil tú incháilithe an íocaíochta ar a rinne tú iarratas uirthi a fháil
If you are applying for a payment due to an illness or disability your doctor must fill in part of the application from
Má tá tú ag déanamh iarratais ar íocaíocht de bharr tinnis nó míchumais ní mór do do dhochtúir cuid den fhoirm iarratais a líonadh isteach
If you are in work, your employer may have to fill in a part of the form
Má tá tú ag obair, d’fhéadfadh sé go mbeidh ar d’fhostóir cuid den fhoirm a líonadh isteach
The type of information required depends on the payment you apply for
Braitheann an cineál faisnéise a theastaíonn ar an íocaíocht ar a dhéanann tú iarratas uirthi

When you send your application form into the Department of Social Protection it will be assessed to make sure that it is correctly completed and that you have sent all the required documentation with your application form

Nuair a sheolann tú d'fhoirm iarratais isteach chuig an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí measúnófar í chun a chinntiú go bhfuil sí comhlánaithe i gceart agus gur sheol tú an doiciméadú is gá ar fad le d'fhoirm iarratais
At this point, the Department may request further information from you or ask you to attend a medical examination to find out if you qualify for the payment you applied for

Ag an bpointe seo, is féidir leis an Roinn tuilleadh eolais a iarraidh ort nó iarraidh ort freastal ar scrúdú leighis chun a fháil amach an bhfuil tú incháilithe an íocaíocht ar a rinne tú iarratas uirthi a fháil
For example if you apply for Disability Allowance you may be asked to attend for a medical examination
Mar shampla, má dhéanann tú iarratas ar Liúntas Míchumais is féidir iarraidh ort freastal ar scrúdú leighis

If this is the case, the doctor's report stating whether or not you meet the medical criteria is sent to the person at the Department of Social Protection who is responsible for making a decision on your claim

Más é seo an cás, seolfar tuarascáil an dochtúra cibé an gcomhlíonann tú na critéir leighis nó nach gcomhlíonann chuig an duine ag an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí atá freagrach as cinneadh a dhéanamh ar d'éileamh
When the Department has all the information it needs, a Deciding Officer will examine your claim and will either accept or reject your claim for the social welfare payment you applied for

Nuair a bheidh an t-eolas ar fad atá ag teastáil ón Roinn aici, déanfaidh Oifigeach Breithiúnachta scrúdú ar d'éileamh agus glacfaidh sé/sí nó diúltóidh sé/sí le d'éileamh don íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh ar a rinne tú iarratas uirthi
The Deciding Officer must apply the law as laid out in Social Welfare Acts, Statutory Instruments, and relevant Department guidelines, circulars etc
Ní mór don Oifigeach Cinnidh an dlí a fheidhmiú mar atá leagtha amach in Achtanna Leasa Shóisialaigh, Ionstraimí Reachtúla, agus Treoirlínte ábhartha na Roinne, Ciorcláin srl
when making a decision on your claim
agus cinneadh á dhéanamh ar d'éileamh
If your claim is approved, the Deciding Officer will determine the rate of your payment
Má fhaomhaítear d'éileamh, cinnteoidh an tOifigeach Breithiúnachta ráta d'íocaíochta
A Deciding Officer must record his or her decision on your claim in writing
Ní mór d’Oifigeach Breithiúnachta a c(h)inneadh ar d'éileamh a thaifead i scríbhinn
Generally, if your application for a payment has been successful you will get a letter stating this
De ghnáth, má éirigh le d'iarratas ar íocaíocht gheobhaidh tú litir ag deimhniú a leithéad
If the decision is unfavorable however, the deciding officer must give you a letter stating you claim has been rejected and also the reasons for this decision in writing
Mura éiríonn le do chinneadh, áfach, ní mór don oifigeach breithiúnachta litir a thabhairt duit ag rá go ndiúltaíodh d’éileamh agus chomh maith leis sin na cúiseanna don chinneadh seo i scríbhinn
If you have been awarded less than the maximum rate of payment you must get a letter stating the reasons for this
Má bhronnadh níos lú ná an t-uasráta íocaíochta ort, ní mór duit litir a fháil a luann na cúiseanna maidir leis seo
It is useful to know the reason or reasons why a deciding officer rejected your claim or awarded you less than the maximum rate of payment, especially if you wish to challenge his or her decision

Tá sé úsáideach eolas a bheith agat ar an gcúis nó ar na cúiseanna gur dhiúltaigh oifigeach breithiúnachta d'éileamh nó gur bhronn sé/sí níos lú ná an t-uasráta íocaíochta ort, go háirithe más mian leat dul i gcoinne a c(h)innidh
If you disagree with the decision a Deciding Officer made in relation to your claim you can:
Mura n-aontaíonn tú leis an gcinneadh a rinne Oifigeach Cinnidh maidir le d'éileamh is féidir leat:

• Contact the Deciding Officer who is dealing with your claim with any further evidence or information to support your claim and request the Deciding officer to review your claim. In this case the Deciding officer can review your claim

• Teagmháil a dhéanamh leis an Oifigeach Cinnidh atá ag déileáil le d'éileamh le fianaise nó eolas breise ar bith chun tacú le d'éileamh agus iarraidh ar an t-oifigeach Breithiúnachta athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar d'éileamh
If you are not happy with the outcome of a reviewed decision by a deciding officer, you can appeal the reviewed decision to the Social Welfare Appeals Office
Sa chás seo is féidir leis an oifigeach Breithiúnachta athbhreithniú a dhéanamh ar d'éileamh nó é a sheoladh díreach chuig oifigeach achomhairc le haghaidh cinnidh
• Appeal the decision of the deciding Officer directly to the Social Welfare Appeals Office
• Iarraidh ar achomharc ar Chinneadh an Oifigigh chinnidh díreach chuig Oifig Achomhairc Leasa Shóisialaigh
Further information about appealing social welfare decisions is available here
Tá tuilleadh eolais faoi conas iarraidh ar achomharc ar chinntí leasa shóisialaigh ar fáil anseo
